blogPost.excerpt: Penpot is a free & open source design tool Create beautiful user interfaces in collaboration with your cross-domain teams. Components, low-code, libraries and design systems support! Native SVG! Share, present and test your designs, all in one place.
blogPost.body: Penpot is a free & open source design tool Create beautiful user interfaces in collaboration with your cross-domain teams. Components, low-code, libraries and design systems support! Native SVG! Share, present and test your designs, all in one place.
blogPost.title: Penpot - Design freedom for teams
blogPost.author: diacritica

localize.description: Penpot是一个免费开源的设计工具，与你的跨领域团队合作创建美丽的用户界面。支持组件、低代码、库和设计系统! 原生SVG! 分享、展示和测试你的设计，都在一个地方。
Penpot是一個免費開源的設計工具，與你的跨領域團隊合作創建美麗的用戶界面。支持組件、低代碼、庫和設計系統! 原生SVG! 分享、展示和測試你的設計，都在一個地方。

previous.excerpt: FreezingCam is an app that lets you freeze your webcam during video calls on purpose! You can also fake a stuttering webcam or even play a video instead of your webcam!
previous.title: FreezingCam - Freeze your webcam during video calls

localize.description: FreezingCam是一款可以让你在视频通话过程中故意冻结你的网络摄像头的应用！你还可以伪造一个口吃的网络摄像头，甚至是播放一个视频来代替你的网络摄像头。你还可以伪造一个口吃的网络摄像头，甚至播放视频，而不是你的网络摄像头!
localize.tagline: 在视频通话时冻结你的网络摄像头

localize.description: FreezingCam是一款可以讓你在視頻通話過程中故意凍結你的網絡攝像頭的應用！你還可以僞造一個口喫的網絡攝像頭，甚至是播放一個視頻來代替你的網絡攝像頭。你還可以僞造一個口喫的網絡攝像頭，甚至播放視頻，而不是你的網絡攝像頭!
localize.tagline: 在視頻通話時凍結你的網絡攝像頭

next.excerpt: Simple web video game, avalible in english and french. Are you going to find out who the impostor is? Perfect for a short break between two zoom calls.
next.title: Undercover game online - Find the impostor

localize.description: 简单的网络视频游戏，可在英语和法语。你要找出谁是冒牌货吗？完美的两个变焦电话之间的短暂休息。
簡單的網絡視頻遊戲，可在英語和法語。你要找出誰是冒牌貨嗎？完美的兩個變焦電話之間的短暫休息。
